Back: Are you sure you want to do this?
Tilbage: Er du sikker på, at du vil gøre dette?

Back: Are you sure you want to revoke the user's tokens?
Tilbage: Er du sikker på, at du vil tilbagekalde kundens tokens?

Back: Please correct the password reset token.
Please specify the correct account and try again.
Tilbage: Angiv den korrekte konto, og prøv igen.

Back: Your password reset link has expired.
Tilbage: Dit link til nulstilling af adgangskode er udløbet.

Back: We're unable to send the password reset email.
Tilbage: Vi kan ikke sende password reset e-mail.

Back: We'll email you a link to reset your password.
Tilbage: Vi sender dig et link til at nulstille din adgangskode.

Back: You cannot delete your own account.
Tilbage: Du kan ikke slette din egen konto.

Back: You have entered an invalid password for current user.
Tilbage: Du har indtastet en ugyldig adgangskode for den aktuelle bruger.

Back: We can't find a user to delete.
Tilbage: Vi kan ikke finde en bruger at slette.

Back: You have revoked the user's tokens.
We can't find a user to revoke.
Tilbage: Vi kan ikke finde en bruger at tilbagekalde.
Du kan ikke slette selvtildelte roller.

Back: An error occurred while deleting this role.
Tilbage: Der opstod en fejl under sletning af denne rolle.

Back: An error occurred while saving this role.
Tilbage: Der opstod en fejl under lagring af denne rolle.

Back: A user with the same user name or email already exists.
Tilbage: Der findes allerede en bruger med dette brugernavn og/eller e-mail adresse.

Back: Sorry, but this password has already been used. Please create another.
Tilbage: Beklager, men denne adgangskode er allerede brugt. Opret venligst en anden.

Back: You did not sign in correctly or your account is temporarily disabled.
Tilbage: Du har enten tastet forkert brugernavn, kodeord eller din konto er blevet midlertidig deaktiveret.

Back: You need more permissions to access this.
Tilbage: Du behøver flere tilladelser for at få adgang til dette.

Back: User Name is a required field.
First Name is a required field.
Last Name is a required field.
Your password must be at least %1 characters.
Tilbage: Din adgangskode skal være på mindst %1 tegn.

Back: Your password must include both numeric and alphabetic characters.
Tilbage: Din adgangskode skal indeholde både numeriske og alfabetiske tegn.

Back: Your password confirmation must match your password.
Tilbage: Din adgangskodebekræftelse skal matche din adgangskode.

Back: It's time to change your password.
Tilbage: Det er tid til at ændre din adgangskode.

Back: It's time to change your password.
Tilbage: Det er tid til at ændre din adgangskode.

Back: Your password has expired; please contact your administrator.
Tilbage: Din adgangskode er udløbet. Kontakt venligst din administrator.

Back: Enter your email address.  You will receive an email with a link to reset your password.
Tilbage: Indtast din email adresse. Du vil modtage en e-mail med et link til at nulstille din adgangskode.

Back: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove this user from already assigned role\r\nAre you sure?
Tilbage: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove this user from already assigned role\r\nAre you sure?

Back: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove those users from already assigned roles\r\nAre you sure?
Tilbage: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove those users from already assigned roles\r\nAre you sure?
Bekræftelse af nulstilling af adgangskode for %name

Back: There was recently a request to change the password for your account.
Tilbage: Der var for nylig en anmodning om at ændre adgangskoden til din konto.

Back: If you requested this change, reset your password here:
Tilbage: Hvis du har anmodet om denne ændring skal du angive en ny adgangskode her:

Back: If you did not make this request, you can ignore this email and your password will remain the same.
Tilbage: Hvis du ikke du bad om denne anmodning kan du ignorere denne e-mail og adgangskoden vil forblive den samme.

Back: We have received a request to change the following information associated with your account at %store_name: %changes.
Tilbage: Vi har modtaget en anmodning om at ændre de følgende oplysninger i forbindelse med din konto på %store_name: e-mail.

Back: If you have not authorized this action, please contact us immediately at %store_email
Tilbage: Hvis du ikke har godkendt denne handling, skal du kontakte os straks på  %store_email

Back: Email template chosen based on theme fallback when "Default" option is selected.
Tilbage: E-mail skabelon valgt baseret på temaets fallback når "Standard" indstilling er markeret.

Back: Maximum Login Failures to Lockout Account
We will disable this feature if the value is empty.
Tilbage: We will disable this feature if the value is empty.

Back: The password for your account has been successfully changed.
Tilbage: Adgangskoden til din konto er blevet ændret.

Back: If you did not request this change, please contact us.
Tilbage: Hvis du ikke har anmodet om denne ændring, bedes du kontakte os.

Back: A new admin account was created for %first_name, %last_name using %email.
Tilbage: En ny administratorkonto blev oprettet til %first_name, %last_name ved hjælp af %email.

Back: The password entered for the current user is invalid. Verify the password and try again.
Tilbage: Den indtastede adgangskode for den aktuelle bruger er ugyldig. Kontroller adgangskoden og prøv igen.

Back: The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later.
Tilbage: Log-in på kontoen var forkert eller din konto er midlertidigt deaktiveret. Vent venligst og prøv igen senere.

Back: More permissions are needed to access this.
Tilbage: Der er brug for flere tilladelser for at få adgang til dette.

Back: The password reset token is incorrect. Verify the token and try again.
Tilbage: Adgangskoden til nulstilling af adgangskode er forkert. Kontroller token og prøv igen.

Back: Your account is temporarily disabled. Please try again later.
Tilbage: Your account is temporarily disabled. Please try again later.

Back: "User Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Tilbage: "User Name" is required. Enter and try again.

Back: "First Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Tilbage: "First Name" is required. Enter and try again.

Back: "Last Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Tilbage: "Last Name" is required. Enter and try again.
